mapper.select: select DISTINCT(hotelName),countryid,t.valueName alias,address,photograph,hotelType,score,MIN(roomPrice) minimum,s.id from hotel s,hotelbrand h,dictionaries t,citys c,houses ho where s.hotelType=t.valueId and c.id=h.citysid and s.countryid=c.id and t.typeName="酒店类型" and ho.hotelId=s.id and countryid=#{countryid} GROUP BY hotelName
select id from citys where name=#{names}
select *,(select valueName from dictionaries t where s.hotelType=t.valueId and t.typeName="酒店类型") alias,(SELECT name FROM citys c WHERE c.id=s.countryid) cityName from hotel s where id=#{id}
select s.id,d.valueName valueName,s.roomSize,s.BedArea,s.floor,s.isHavingbed,s.window,s.roomImage from houses s ,dictionaries d where s.roomNameId= d.valueId and d.typeName="房型" and s.hotelId=#{id}
select r.houseId,r.roomTitle,r.isbreakfast,r.cancellationPolicy,r.number, (r.Price+h.roomPrice)as price from houses h,rooms r where r.hotelId = h.id and r.houseId =#{id}
